it.ppm.codebookmodel
Class CbModel

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      it.ppm.codebookmodel.CbModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class CbModel
extends java.lang.Thread

This class implent Background Subraction's algorithm trough model based on CodeBook.

Constructor Detail

CbModel

public CbModel(PApplet theParent,
               int width,
               int height)
Construct a new object CbModel with the specified dimension of the video.This function set class in too "Learning" state.

Parameters:
theParent - pointer to the caller.
width - video's width.
height - video's height.

CbModel

public CbModel(PApplet theParent,
               int width,
               int height,
               float alpha,
               float beta,
               float epsilon_1,
               float epsilon_2,
               float percent_tm,
               int color_background,
               int color_foreground)
Construct a new object CbModel whit the specified parameters of the video.This function set class in too "Learning" state.

Parameters:
theParent - pointer to the caller.
width - video's width.
height - video's height.
alpha - brightness'parameter ,between 0.4-0.7 .
beta - brightness'parameter,tipically between 1.1-1.5 .
epsilon_1 - max tollerance of brightenns's deviation and the color of a pixel(in order too recognise a pixel from another) phase's "Learning".
epsilon_2 - max tollerance of brightenns's deviation and the color of a pixel(in order too recognise a pixel from another) phase's "Testing".
percent_tm - temporal threshold's parameter,tipically is 0.7.
color_background - background pixel's color.
color_foreground - foreground pixel's color.
Method Detail

updateModel

public void updateModel(PImage Image)
                 throws LearningStateException,
                        WrongSizeException
Method of building/uploading of the model contained in the object,this will evenctually start a thread,if not yet operating, that build the model according too previous image passed.

Parameters:
Image - Image to build/uploading the model.
Throws:
LearningStateException - Exception that may appears if this method is called during Testing phase.
WrongSizeException - Exception that may appears if Image has different dimension from those setted in the object.

run in interface java.lang.Runnable

getDifferenceImage

public PImage getDifferenceImage(PImage Image)
                          throws WrongSizeException,
                                 LearningStateException
Returns an image where each pixel'color of image is: color_background(default black) if such a pixel has been recognized by the model like a pixel's background color_foreground (default white) if such a pixel has been recognized by the model like a pixel's foreground.

Parameters:
Image - Image that must be processed by the model.
Returns:
the image that represent background's pixels and foreground's pixels.
Throws:
WrongSizeException - Exception that may appears if Image has different dimension from those setted in the object.
LearningStateException - Exception that may appears if this method is called during Testing phase.

public void setEpsilon2(float epsilon)
Set epsilon_2' s parameter value.

Parameters:
epsilon - a new max threshold of brightenns's deviation and the color of a pixel.

setTestState

public void setTestState()
The mand of status changement from "Learning" to "Testing",obviously this transit should not be immediate,this depend from thrend execution.

isTestState

public boolean isTestState()
The method return too effective status of the object:true if in the Testinf state,false if in "learning" state.

Returns:
true if the CbModel is in the state' Test ,false otherwise.
